article_title: Modern Healthcare Modern Healthcare business news, research, data and events
article_text: Michael Sandler does general assignment reporting as well as reporting on hospital system finances. He earned a master's degree in journalism from Columbia College in Chicago in 2012 after earning a bachelor’s degree from Cardinal Stritch University in Milwaukee. Joined Modern Healthcare in 2013.

article_metadata.description: Ascension's surplus dropped nearly 40% in its most recent quarter as investment returns fell significantly from a year ago, even though returns on its portfolio are beginning to stabilize.
article_metadata.title: Ascension Health takes a hit on investments; surplus falls
